name: amnezia-wg-easy
description: Enhanced fork of amnezia-wg-easy with amneziawg-go

scripts.dev: docker run --rm -it --name amnezia-wg-easy-dev --device=/dev/net/tun:/dev/net/tun --cap-add=NET_ADMIN --cap-add=SYS_MODULE --sysctl="net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1" --sysctl="net.ipv4.ip_forward=1" -v ~/.amnezia-wg-easy:/etc/amnezia/amneziawg -p 51820:51820/udp -p 51821:51821/tcp -e LANGUAGE=ru -e WG_HOST=127.0.0.1 -e PASSWORD=test123 amnezia-wg-easy

author: IMBT
